message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it is worth $1,250,000. We understand its significance to you and hope this offer aligns with your expectations.

Alice, your product seems great, but $1,250,000 is a bit high for me right now. I'm willing to pay $1,150,000,  which is still a fair price considering the value you place on it. Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we believe that a fair price for the product would be $1,225,000. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate, and we hope this proposal meets within your budget while reflecting the value we place on our product.
